# Problem 1 

Read and clean the data; retain line, station, name, station latitude / longitude, routes served, entry, vending, entrance type, and ADA compliance.

```{r}

transit_df= 
  read_csv("NYC_Transit_Subway_Entrance_And_Exit_Data.csv",
  na= c("NA","",".") 
  )

transit_tidy_df= 
  transit_df|>
  janitor::clean_names()

transit_tidy_df

```
